item.title: A Good Day Out
item.description: Every Sunday, the BMW Motorcycle Club of WA meets for morning coffee at Catalano’s cafe in Vic Park to talk about motorcycles and life. Around 8:30am, a group will form up behind the leader and head out for a nice ride to lunch in the countryside, doing a few hundred kilometres and away for several hours. It’s almost always a top ride and today was no exception. Up to Lesmurdie and through the hills then down to the plain and a stint on the freeway to Kwinana then Rockingham.
